name: MindManager XML Map Template
summary: An XMMAT file is a mind map template created by Corel MindManager, a visual diagramming application. It contains a diagram, which may include interconnected objects, text, images, and symbols. XMMAT files are similar to the more common .MMAT templates but saved in the XML standard instead of the binary MMAT format.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: XMMAT file open in Corel MindManager 22
